products.name: Polyjuice Potion
products.description: Tired of seeing the same old face in the mirror everyday ? Good news, for an hour you won't have to !

products.name: Confusing Concoction
products.description: Causes the drinker to become confused, distracted and sick.

products.name: Accio
products.description: Single use. Convenient if you're on the couch and can't be bothered to stand to grab the remote

products.name: Alohomora
products.description: Single use. Unlocks safes, house doors, car doors. To use responsibly.

products.name: Product 5
products.description: Across from where? No… but I'd like to be asked! As you may or may not know, Lindsay and I have hit a bit of a rough patch.

products.name: Thing 6
products.description: No! I was ashamed to be SEEN with you. I like being with you. Oh, you're gonna be in a coma, all right.

products.name: Oculus Reparo
products.description: Single use. This spell fixes glasses. Simple and to the point.

products.name: Scourgify
products.description: Hate spring cleaning? Then you’ll love this charm that does the cleaning for you.

products.name: Hiccoughing Potion
products.description: Hiccoughing is annoying. Get rid of it in two sips !

products.name: Pepperup Potion
products.description: Improves health, relieves coughs and colds. Side effect: causes steam to dribble from the patient's ears for several hours afterward.

products.name: Felix Felicis
products.description: Out of luck ? Not anymore ! Highly recommended before playing the lottery, asking for a promotion, or crossing the road with your eyes closed.

products.name: Muffliato
products.description: Single use. This spell is especially useful for parents hoping to discuss delicate topics around their kids. Muffliato fills targets’ ears with a buzzing noise, making them unable to hear anything around them.

products.name: Veritaserum
products.description: Want to know how people feel about you, for real ? With Veritaserum, you can finally find out. Usually paired with a 'Fixing hurt feelings' concotion.

products.name: Skele-Gro
products.description: To be administered by a medical professional, for bones re-growth. Side effects include extreme pain.

products.name: Sleekeazy's Hair Potion
products.description: Who needs hairgel when you have Sleekeazy's Hair Potion ?

products.name: Cushioning Charm
products.description: Single use. Never worry about falling again thanks to this charm that creates an invisible cushion around you or whatever you decide to use it on.

products.name: Draught of Peace
products.description: Provides personal comfort, calms anxiety and soothes agitation.
